title: Reparable Heart
description: I fell in love with a man who has broken me. I'm shattered and scared. I feel defeated. I've tried to escape, but he just continues to find me. I have stopped running and have just succumbed to the pain. That is until another man comes along to pick up the pieces of my heart that I never knew was reparable. He's sweet, charming and sexy. Will he save me from myself and the man who has destroyed me, or will the man that destroyed me win.**Please Note** Sexual content and explicit language. Physical violence and abuse - may trigger some.
author: Ashlee Wahl
